sentences.en: Charles is haunted by ghostly children.
sentences.cn: 孩子们的幽灵缠上了查尔斯。

sentences.en: Ghostly , private worldswill be overlaid on reality, sensitive only to members.
sentences.cn: 私人世界可怕的铺在真实之上, 却只对成员有意义.

sentences.en: Ghostly birds began to sing among the blue leaves.
sentences.cn: 幽灵般的鸟儿在蓝色的树叶中开始歌唱.

sentences.en: Ghostly shapes loomed out of the fog.
sentences.cn: 雾中显现出影影绰绰的轮廓.

sentences.en: He could still see ghostly shadows of the boys tney had been.
sentences.cn: 他在他俩的身上还看得到当年小时候的朦胧影子.

sentences.en: He told us the legend of the ghostly horseman.
sentences.cn: 他给我们讲幽灵骑士的传说.

sentences.en: Her face was ghostly pale with fright.
Her voice was modulated to a ghostly cheerfulness.
sentences.cn: 她的声音是愉快的,但做作得可怕.

sentences.en: Lights reflected off dust-covered walls creating a ghostly luminescence.
sentences.cn: 灯光照在满是灰尘的墙上，反射回苍白的冷光。

sentences.en: No, it is not the ghostly wind, bride, do not be frightened.
sentences.cn: 不, 这不是一阵阴风, 新娘, 不要惊惶.

sentences.en: Only the neon in the cold counter glared a ghostly blue.
sentences.cn: 只有冷藏柜上的氖灯发出阴惨惨的蓝光.

sentences.en: Quick as lightning , the ghostly face lowered itself and disappeared.
sentences.cn: 说时迟,那时快, 那个鬼脸一晃,就沉下去不见了.

sentences.en: She started to be affected by the ghostly presence she could feel in the house.
sentences.cn: 她觉得这座房子里有可怕的鬼怪，开始变得神经紧张。

sentences.en: The moon shone, shedding a ghostly light on the fields.
sentences.cn: 月亮闪耀，田野上洒下幽幽的亮光。

sentences.en: There are some ghostly shapes of bats flitting about in the dark.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中有些蝙蝠飞翔的鬼影.
